sprint_goal: Establish a secure, multi-tenant foundation. Enable the first Admin to register their organization, log in, and be protected by basic security policies.
key_deliverables: Public registration page; Secure login/logout flow; Forgot password flow; Core security rules; Role-based routing.
demo_objectives: Successfully register a new organization; Log in as the new Admin; Demonstrate password complexity and account lockout.
success_criteria: All 'Must Have' stories for the sprint are completed and demo-ready; All security rule tests pass.
risk_factors: Complexity of atomic registration logic (RISK-001); Correct implementation of core security rules.
mitigation_strategies: Extensive integration testing with Firebase Emulator; Peer review of all security-related code.
burndown_target: Linear burndown with 50% completion by day 5

sprint_goal: Build the complete user invitation and registration flow, and establish team structure management.
key_deliverables: Admin 'Invite User' flow; Invitation email system; Registration completion page; Admin 'Create Team' flow.
demo_objectives: Admin invites a new user; Invited user receives email and completes registration; Admin creates a new team and assigns a supervisor.
success_criteria: Full user invitation-to-activation loop is functional and secure.
risk_factors: Email deliverability (spam filters); Secure handling of invitation tokens.
mitigation_strategies: Use a reputable email provider (SendGrid); Secure token generation and server-side validation.
integration_windows: Integration testing of email flow with Mailtrap/SendGrid sandbox.

sprint_goal: Implement the core Subordinate workflow for attendance marking, including online/offline support and accessibility.
key_deliverables: Mobile dashboard for Subordinate; Check-in/out functionality; Location permission flow; Basic accessibility setup.
demo_objectives: Subordinate logs into mobile app; Grants location permissions; Successfully performs a check-in and a check-out.
success_criteria: Core attendance marking is functional and reliable on both iOS and Android.
risk_factors: Inconsistent GPS performance on different devices; Platform-specific permission handling nuances.
mitigation_strategies: Test on a wide range of physical devices; Use a mature permissions-handling library.
integration_windows: E2E testing on physical devices throughout the sprint.

sprint_goal: Make the core mobile experience robust and reliable by implementing offline support and user feedback for sync issues.
key_deliverables: Offline check-in/out capability; Automatic data sync on reconnect; Persistent failure notifications with manual retry.
demo_objectives: Perform check-in in airplane mode; Reconnect and show data syncs; Demonstrate the persistent failure banner and retry mechanism.
success_criteria: Attendance data is never lost due to network issues; User is always aware of data sync status.
risk_factors: Silent loss of offline data (RISK-002); Complexity of testing network failure scenarios.
mitigation_strategies: Implement auxiliary local DB for sync tracking; Dedicate significant QA time to manual testing with network manipulation tools.
integration_windows: Focus on E2E tests simulating various offline and intermittent connectivity scenarios.

sprint_goal: Launch the minimum viable product for the Supervisor role, enabling them to manage their team's attendance records.
epic_coverage: Core Attendance Workflow, Tenant & User Lifecycle Management
key_deliverables: Supervisor mobile dashboard; Pending approval list; Single approve/reject actions; UI for flagged records.
demo_objectives: Admin creates a team and assigns members; Subordinate checks in; Supervisor logs in and sees the pending record; Supervisor approves/rejects the record.
success_criteria: The full attendance lifecycle from creation to supervisor approval is functional.
risk_factors: Incorrect security rules allowing supervisors to see other teams' data.
mitigation_strategies: Rigorous automated testing of all Firestore Security Rules for the Supervisor role.
integration_windows: E2E testing of the full Subordinate -> Supervisor workflow.
